What we need to do:
0: Get credentials and firebase_credentials from GitHub Action Secrets and create two .json that are available when the pipelines run
1: Download any new questions from Google Sheets L1
2: Update metadata of present questions, especially with LLM feature data
(3): Create new questions based on LLM corrections
(4): After that, run 2 again
5: Generate L3
6. Move the l3.json in to ipq-frontend/public
7. save backup of the database
